tensortrade.features package¶

tensortrade.features.get(identifier)[source]¶

Gets the FeaturePipeline that matches with the identifier.

Parameters

identifier (str) – The identifier for the FeaturePipeline

Raises

KeyError – if identifier is not associated with any FeaturePipeline

Return type

FeaturePipeline
